name: Slashing Current
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You form and slash with a thin, pressurized blade of water. Make a magic attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 slashing damage, plus your spellcasting stat. This damage ignores resistance to slashing damage and DR.

If this spell reduces a creature to 0 or fewer hit points, you can use this spell again for 0 MP and AP on your next turn. You can't empower this spell when used in this way.
